Title: Relates to prohibiting the issuance of late fees prior to a finding of liability; repealer
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the issuance of late fees prior to a finding of liability.
LawCode: Amd §§235 & 238, rpld §235 sub 2 ¶¶b - b-3, add §238-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the issuance of late fees prior to a finding of liability for a parking violation; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
